html:
The institutions of modern science have lost public trust. There was a time when they were capable of incredible things. They could fake moon landings, invent climate change, and obfuscate alien visits. Today the government and big pharma are engaged in a conspiracy to improve public health through the use of safe, effective, and inexpensive vaccines. We say enough is enough.

The Vicious Accusations Against Us

As advocates for health and freedom, we wish to clarify our stance on vaccines. We have been unfairly and maliciously characterized as being “anti-vaccine” Nothing could be further from the truth.  We are not anti-vaccine, we are pro unattainable vaccine! 

We have also been accused of imposing arbitrary standards of safety. Our standards are far from arbitrary. They are exquisitely crafted to sound reasonable, but realistically impossible, unethical, or both. Sadly none of the currently available jabs meet this simple threshold. When it comes to vaccines: “If it exists we resist.” 

We base our standards on a broad consensus of celebrities, influencers, podcasters, athletes, and politicians.  For years, we’ve been unfairly labeled as science deniers and conspiracy theorists. But the truth is, we simply hold vaccines to a much higher standard than the so-called “experts” at the CDC, WHO, and every major medical institution worldwide. What we lack in expertise we make up in arrogance and tenacity. 

We have 4 matters of concern when it comes to vaccines

The Research

Theirs is a compilation of cold facts collected from hundreds of thousands of anonymous children. Ours is comprised of heart-felt anecdotes from nervous wine-moms. Our data needs to be taken just as seriously as research produced by the so-called experts.

The Toxins

Have you read the list of ingredients in a vaccine? You would have to be an expert in virology, immunology, and biochemistry just to figure them out! We know better. Every ingredient must undergo a rigorous Google toxicology analysis. We must not expose our children to ingredients that are difficult to pronounce or sound icky.

The Schedule

The number of diseases from which our innocent children are protected is shocking. Sure, the elites have degrees in pediatrics, infectious disease, immunology, and epidemiology, but they don’t know what my child likes for breakfast. Public health decisions should be made on case-by-case basis based on intuition, misinformation, and paranoia. 

Big Pharma

We will only accept vaccines produced by entities that lack Big Pharma’s scientific expertise, production capacity, quality control, and distribution resources.
